desc: Hobbes Innovation is the world leader in manufacture and distribution of Cable Testers, Network Testers, Fiber Testers, PoE Testers, Network Tools, Power Surge, Power Supply, Wireless Solutions, Telecommunication Applications and other products that facilitate the advancement of today’s connection.

layout.text: Network installation, repair, troubleshoot and maintenance, Hobbes Innovation is the leading source for test and measurement equipment designed to keep the world connected.
